shape

Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • shape.Shape
      • shape.Triangle

  • public class Triangle
extends shape.Shape
    Triangle class extending the shape class. Has methods for creating, comparing and modifying triangles
    Author:
    Parag Bhatnagar

        double s2,
        double s3)
         throws shape.NotATriangle
        Creates a new Triangle object with 3 sides as input
        Parameters:
        s1 - Side 1, starting at (0,0) and extending right along the x axis
        s2 - Side 2
        s3 - Side 3
        Throws:
        shape.NotATriangle
